data.name: Volcanic Core Demo
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Volcanic Core!
Face five unforgiving pilots and if you are worthy, fight a near unbeatable giant boss.
Improve your skills in twelve challenging areas that will test all aspect of piloting.


Thrilling combat in a extraordinary musical universe!



    (Demo has limited content)
  • Improving on 90's arcade games like Cyber Sled, Virtual ON and Battlezone
  • Five vehicle with unique weapon systems to choose from.
  • Twelve challenge areas with hours of play:
    • Trench run
    • Shooting range
    • Target practice
    • Giant Mazes
    • Survival
    • Mega boss
  • A very organic musical experience like no other: impacts, motions and events are all part of your vehicle music track.


Select your fighter!




  • VS computer Combat (Five + Boss)
  • 3 Training Areas to master the basics
  • 12 Challenges city wide areas to test all aspects of your piloting skills.
1st person view or 3rd person, the choice is yours!


Dual Stick controls: Gamepad or VR Motion Controls with sticks, Vive Wand NOT supported (As it's a trackpad)

data.short_description: Thrilling vehicle combat within a musical universe! Face fierce pilots & reach a near unbeatable boss... Train to improve your skills or venture in very diverse challenge areas. Demo Version has 1/5 of Versus AI level, and 2 challenges Levels.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon R9 580 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 850 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Does NOT support Vive Wands or trackpads
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon R9 580 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 820 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Does NOT support Vive Wands or trackpads
